ProductInfo.Features:
Plug-and-play, remote P2P(Peer to Peer) connection, no need for port mapping, H.264 Main profile level 3.0 coding, real time H.264 dual-stream encoding, resolution, frame rate and bit rate are adjustable.
Integrated ONVIF standard, compatible with third-party ONVIF platform software. 1/4" 1.0 Megapixel CMOS Sensor, maximum image resolution is up to 1280*720@25fps.
Supports monitoring via computer, iPhone, and most Android smartphones on the market. PC surveillance software and mobile phone client are included, very easy remote network surveillance.
Support Color/BW mode converting, IR-CUT Filter. Support motion detection and two way audio. Auto-retrieve function and auto-connection network.
IP66 rated waterproof. Automatic IR LED illumination for night vision (up to 40 metres).
ProductInfo.Name: Docooler IPCC P2P 720P Wireless Wifi IP Cloud Waterproof Camera ONVIF H.264 IR-Cut Night Vision Motion Detection Waterproof
